00011 class CMPostgreSQLQuery implements CMQueryProtocol {
00012  
00018  public static function Version() {
00019   return "1.0";
00020  }
00021  
00027  public static function Since() {
00028   return "1.0";
00029  }

00034  private $query = false;
00035  
00039  private $a = array();
00040  
00050  public function CMPostgreSQLQuery($q, $a = array()) {
00051   $this->query = $q;
00052   $this->a = $a;
00053  }
00054  
00087  public function fetch($rowMode = 'assoc', $formatter = false) {
00088   if(isset($this->a['formatter']) && $formatter === false)
00089    $formatter = $this->a['formatter'];
00090    
00091   if(!$this->query)
00092    return false;
00093   
00094   if($rowMode == 'assoc')
00095    $r = pg_fetch_assoc($this->query);
00096   elseif($rowMode == 'line')
00097    $r = pg_fetch_row($this->query);
00098   elseif($rowMode == 'row')
00099    $r = pg_fetch_array($this->query, NULL, PGSQL_BOTH);
00100   elseif($rowMode == 'pair') {
00101    $r = pg_fetch_row($this->query);
00102    if(!$r)
00103     return false;
00104    $r = array($r[0] => $r[1]);
00105   }
00106   elseif($rowMode == 'cell') {
00107    $r = pg_fetch_row($this->query);
00108    if(!$r)
00109     return false;
00110    $r = $r[0];
00111   }
00112   else
00113    $r = false;
00114   
00115   // apply formatter
00116   if($formatter !== false)
00117    $r = $formatter->format($r);
00118   
00119   return $r;
00120  }
00121  
00130  public function fetchAll($rowMode = 'assoc', $direction = 'horizontal', $formatter = false) {
00131   if(!$this->query)
00132    return false;
00133   $r = array();
00134   
00135   if($direction == 'single')
00136    return $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter);
00137   
00138   while($row = $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter)) {
00139    if($direction == 'horizontal')
00140     $r[] = $row;
00141    elseif($direction == 'vertical') {
00142     if(is_array($row)) {
00143      foreach($row as $k => $v)
00144       $r[] = $v;
00145     }
00146     else
00147      $r[] = $row;
00148    }
00149    else
00150     return false;
00151   }
00152   
00153   return $r;
00154  }
00155  
00170  public function availableMethods() {
00171   return array('availableMethods', 'affectedRows', 'fetch', 'fetchAll', 'totalRows');
00172  }
00173  
00181  public function affectedRows() {
00182   return pg_affected_rows($this->query);
00183  }
00184  
00192  public function totalRows() {
00193   return pg_num_rows($this->query);
00194  }
00195  
00201  public function success() {
00202   return $this->query !== false;
00203  }
00204  
00208  public function __toString() {
00209   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00210  }
